mapper.select: select '${year}新保',cls,zxcls,hccls,bzxcls,(cls-hccls) as whccls,FORMAT(zxcls/cls,2)*100 as zxzb,FORMAT(cls/cls,2)*100 as zxzb,FORMAT(zxcls/cls,2)*100 as zxzb,FORMAT(whccls/cls,2)*100 as whczb ( select count(distinct cjh) from #{year}xbsj ) as cls, ( select count(distinct cjh) from #{year}xbsj a inner join #{year}shsj b on a.cjh = b.vin where b.wxsrll > 0 ) as zxcls, ( select count(distinct cjh) from #{year}xbsj a inner join#{year}shsj b on a.cjh = b.vin ) as hccls, ( select count(distinct cjh) from #{year}xbsj a inner join #{year}shsj b on a.cjh = b.vin where b.wxsrll = 0 ) as bzxcls
